page.title: 05POSTMAN
page.content: MR. BRIAN FORDHAM Brian Fordham is our postman and owner of our local shop. He comes round with the post whether its raining, snowy or sunny.Together with his green van and Postman Pat jumper he gets round on time with the post. If its sunny or dry and warm Brian will come around on his bike but the post will still get there on time. Brian's wife is Avril. They have two children called Pippa and Joanne.Pippa and Joanne still go to school, and although they still go to schoolthey help deliver the papers if there are any difficulties.When Brian was a bit younger than he is now,he used to be the royal postman.I am sure that the Parish of Stoke Canon is so pleased to have such a nice owner of the local shop.
